lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots signed the free agent Kelley Washington, another deal in an off-season overhaul of their receiving corps. Washington had 72 catches for 893 yards and 9 touchdowns in four seasons with Cincinnati. The Patriots have also signed the free-agent receiver Donte’ Stallworth, who played for the Eagles last season.
